nodes.text: Jedi training droids were a type of training droid used by the Jedi Order. Used for combat training, the droids had two legs, two or four arms, and was capable of changing its appearance with a holoprojector. Less than three years after the death of Qui-Gon Jinn at the hands of Darth Maul, Padawan Anakin Skywalker programmed the droid to mimic the appearance of the Sith during a training session. The droid Arex, stationed at the Al'doleem Jedi monastery on the mountain Mount Passvaal on the river moon of Al'doleem, was a Jedi training droid who aided Jedi Master Kirak Infil'a.
A training droid first appeared in the 2016 comic Obi-Wan and Anakin 1, written by Charles Soule and illustrated by Marco Checchetto.
